Distance From Oslo Airport to Miami International Airport (OSL - MIA Distance)

The flight distance from Oslo Airport (OSL) to Miami International Airport (MIA) is 4732 miles. This is equivalent to 7616 kilometers or 4110 nautical miles. The distance shown below is the straight line distance (may be called as flying or air distance) or direct flight distance between airports.


7616 kilometers is the distance from Oslo Airport, Norway to Miami International Airport, United States.

Flight Duration between Gardermoen, Norway and Miami (MIA), United States

Estimated flight time from Oslo Airport, Gardermoen, Norway to Miami International Airport, Miami (MIA), United States is 9 hours 28 minutes under avarage conditions. The flight time calculator assumes an average flight speed for a commercial airliner of 500 mph, which is equivalent to 805 km/hr or 434 knots. Your actual flying time may vary depending on wind speeds or weather conditions.

Time Difference Between the Airports • OSL - MIA

Time difference between Gardermoen (Norway) and Miami (MIA) (United States) is 6 Hours.
Current local time in Gardermoen is 2025-12-26, 22:30:29 CET and time in Miami (MIA) is 2025-12-26, 16:30:29 EST.
Miami (MIA) time is 6 Hours behind Gardermoen.
